dataset_id: MEaSUREs Greenland Annual Ice Sheet Velocity Mosaics from SAR and Landsat V001
title: MEaSUREs Greenland Annual Ice Sheet Velocity Mosaics from SAR and Landsat V001
summary: This data set, part of the NASA Making Earth System Data Records for Use in Research Environments (MEaSUREs) program, contains annual ice velocity mosaics for the Greenland Ice Sheet derived from Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) data obtained by the German Space Agency's TerraSAR-X/TanDEM-X (TSX/TDX) and the European Space Agency's Copernicus Sentinel-1A and -1B satellites, and from the US Geological Survey's Landsat 8 optical imagery for years 2015 to 2018. See Greenland Ice Mapping Project (GIMP) for related data.
